23.畑に 肥料を使うことで|花や作物の収穫量を 増やすことができます。|<br>|畑:
Using fertilizer on a field can increase the|yield of flowers and crops.|
|"Cowpat" and "Horse Manure" can be used to|fertilize a field. You can only fertilize|once per day.|
|You can fertilize your own field and other|people's fields, too.

24.「お世話の記録」からは|これまでに 畑を お世話してくれた人の記録を|見ることが:
"Record of Care" will allow you to view a|history of everyone who has interacted with|your field.|
|The latest 50 records will be displayed, and|any new records will remove the oldest one.|
|When the plants are harvested from the field,|any records will be reset.|

25.「やりなおす」を選ぶと|畑に植えている物を すべて抜いて|最初から やりなおすこ:
You can use "Replant" to remove any plants in|your field and start over.|
|However, you won't get back what you planted,|so please be careful.|

26.畑に タネをまくことで|花や作物を育てることができます。|<br>|タネは ひと:
By sowing seeds in your field, you can grow|a variety of flowers and crops.|
|Sowing one seed sows it for the entire field,|and you get a total of eight sprouts.|
|The number of times fertilizer is used and the|number of people who water can affect the type|and yield of flowers and crops.|
